Name.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Ivanka's Flaming Dig Tools

Description.value: Gather tons of iron and craft a bunch of Iron Pickaxe and Shovels to obtain a set of named Flaming Steel Shovel and Pickaxe tools.

Author.value: Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Modlet by ShoudenKalferas
